tool_description: Latest news from 6  different sites live feed website.
name: Ukraine War Live News Feed  From 6  Different Sites
title: Ukraine War Live News Feed  From 6  Different Sites
tool_name: Ukraine War Live News Feed  From 6  Different Sites

api_list.name: Get all new Feeds
api_list.description: this endpoint will return back all news about the Ukraine war.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-live-news-feed-from-6-different-sites.p.rapidapi.com/news/sky"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-live-news-feed-from-6-different-sites.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
